page.title: 01Vowchurch and district
page.content: Vowchurch is a very small village located in foothills of black Mountains. It lies in rural location of Golden Valley on B4348 which runs towards Hereford in east. The area is low in population and is agricultural in nature. The village scores very low in terms of amenities but is served by its neighours in some of these respects. Besides farming tourism provides some income. Most families in area find a vehicle quite essential since public transport remains infrequent. It is necessary to travel to find essential such as shools, shops, post office etc
